definition: a liquid or semiliquid mixture, as of flour, eggs, and milk, used in cooking, to make a dent or impression in
details:
noun
- a liquid or semiliquid mixture, as of flour, eggs, and milk, used in cooking
- (baseball) a ballplayer who is batting
= synonyms: hitter, slugger, batsman
verb
- to make a dent or impression in
= example: to make a dent or impression in
= synonyms: dinge
- to strike violently and repeatedly
= example: to strike violently and repeatedly
= synonyms: baste
- to strike against forcefully
= example: to strike against forcefully
= synonyms: buffet
